lead_paragraph: A major component of the overhaul will be the creation of a new agency that will process federal background checks, called the National Background Investigations Bureau.
snippet: A major component of the overhaul will be the creation of a new agency that will process federal background checks, called the National Background Investigations Bureau.

headline.main: Storage of Records of Background Checks Shifted After Last Year’s Security Breach
headline.print_headline: Storage of Records of Background Checks Shifted After Last Year’s Security Breach

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

abstract: Obama administration announces Defense Dept will take over storage of personal information and records resulting from federal background checks on government employees, part of response to 2015 cybersecurity breach at Office of Personnel Management that compromised records of more than 20 million people; Pres Obama will request $95 million in 2017 budget for comprehensive overhaul of nation's cybersecurity program, including creation of National Background Investigations Bureau, which will process all federal background checks.
